original: thabs mkhas thugs rjes sh+aakya'i rigs su 'khrungs //
analyzed: thabs mkhas thugs rjes sh+aakya rigs su khrung

original: gzhan gyis mi thub bdud kyi dpung 'joms pa //
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub bdud kyi dpung joms ba

original: gser gyi lhun po lta bur brjid pa'i sku /
analyzed: gser gyi lhun po lta bur brjid ba sku

original: sh+aakya'i rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sh+aakya rgyal po khyod la phyag tshal lo

original: gang gis dang po byang chub thugs bskyed nas //
analyzed: gang gis dang po byang chub thugs skyed nas

original: bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs mdzad cing //
analyzed: bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs mdzad cing

original: dus 'dir mdzad pa rgya chen 'gro ba yis //
analyzed: dus dir mdzad ba rgya chen gro ba yis

original: mgon gyur khyod la bdag gis bstod par bgyi //
analyzed: mgon gyur khyod la bdag gis bstod ba bgyid

original: lha rnams don mdzad 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas //
analyzed: lha rnams don mdzad dul ba dus mkhyen nas

original: lha las babs nas glang chen ltar gshegs shing //
analyzed: lha las bab nas glang chen ltar gshegs shing

original: rigs la gzigs nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul ma'i //
analyzed: rigs la gzigs nas lha mo sgyu phrul ma

original: lhums su zhugs par mdzad pa phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: lhums su jug ba mdzad ba phyag tshal lo

original: zla ba bcu rdzogs sh+aakya'i sras po ni //
analyzed: zla ba chu rdzogs sh+aakya sras po ni

original: bkra shis lum+bi'i tshal du bltams pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bkra shis lum+bi tshal du ltems ba tshe

original: tshangs dang brgya byin gyis btud mtshan mchog ni //
analyzed: tshangs dang brgya byin gyis dud mtshan mchog ni

original: byang chub rigs su nges mdzad phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub rigs su nges mdzad phyag tshal lo

original: gzhon du stobs ldan mi yi seng+ge des //
analyzed: gzhon du stobs ldan mi yi seng+ge des

original: a g+ha ma ga d+ha ni sgyu rtsal bstan //
analyzed: a g+ha ma ga d+ha ni sgyu rtsal ston

original: skye bo dregs pa can rnams tshar bcad nas //
analyzed: skye bo dregs ba can rnams tshar gcod nas

original: 'gran zla med par mdzad pa phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gran zla med ba mdzad ba phyag tshal lo

original: 'jig chen chos dang mthun par bya ba dang // kha na mtho spang phyir btsun mo yi //
analyzed: jig chen chos dang mthun ba byed ba dang kha na mtho spong phyir btsun mo yi

original: 'khor dang ldan mdzad thabs la mkhas pa yis //
analyzed: khor dang ldan mdzad thabs la mkhas ba yis

original: rgyal srid skyong bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rgyal srid skyong ba mdzad la phyag tshal lo

original: 'khor ba'i bya bar snying po med gzigs nas //
analyzed: khor ba byed ba snying po med gzigs nas

original: khyim nas byung ste mkha' la gshegs nas kyang //
analyzed: khyim nas byung ste mkha la gshegs nas kyang

original: mchod rten rnam dag drung du nyid las nyid //
analyzed: mchod rten rnam dag drung du nyid las nyid

original: rab tu byung bar mdzad pa phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba mdzad ba phyag tshal lo

original: brtson pas byang chub sgrub par dgongs nas ni //
analyzed: brtson ba byang chub sgrub ba dgongs nas ni

original: nye rany+dza na'i 'gram du lo drug tu //
analyzed: nye rany+dza na grams du lo drug tu

original: dka' ba spyad mdzad brtson 'grus mthar phyin pas //
analyzed: dka ba spyod mdzad brtson grus mthar phyin ba

original: bsam gtan mchog brnyes mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo ///
analyzed: bsam gtan mchog brnyes mdzad la phyag tshal lo

original: ga ma med nas 'bad pa don yod phyir //
analyzed: ga ma med nas bad ba don yod phyir

original: ma ga d+ha yi byang chub shing drung du //
analyzed: ma ga d+ha yi byang chub shing drung du

analyzed: skyil krung mi g.yo mngon ba sangs rgya nas

analyzed: byang chub rdzogs ba mdzad ba phyag tshal lo

analyzed: thugs rjes gro la myur du gzigs nas ni

original: wa ra n+aa si la sogs gnas mchog tu //
analyzed: wa ra n+aa si la sogs gnas mchog tu

analyzed: chos kyi khor lo skor nas gdul byed rnams

analyzed: ga ba gsum la god mdzad phyag tshal lo

analyzed: gzhan gyi rgol ba ngan ba tshar gcod phyir

analyzed: mu stegs ston ba drug dang lhas sbyin sogs

analyzed: khor mo jig gi yul du bdud rnams dul

analyzed: thub ba g.yul las rgyal phyag tshal lo

analyzed: srid ba gsum na dpe med yon tan gyi

analyzed: nyan du yod ba cho phrul chen po ston

analyzed: lha mi gro ba kun gyis rab mchod ba

analyzed: ston ba rgya ba mdzad ba phyag tshal lo

analyzed: r+ts+wa mchog grong gi sa gzhi gtsang ma ru

analyzed: chi med rdo rje lta bu sku gshegs nas

analyzed: mya ngan da ba mdzad la phyag tshal lo

analyzed: de nyid du ni ring bsrel mang sprul nas
